dcterms:creator: Yifei Yuan
Wai Lam
dcterms:description: The only existing multi-turn fashion dataset currently, comprising 11,505 sessions across three clothing types – dress, top-tee, and shirt. Each session consists of multiple turns where users provide feedback to refine their search results.
dcterms:title: Multi-turn FashionIQ

dcterms:creator: Tamara L Berg
Alexander C Berg
Jonathan Shih
dcterms:description: An extension of the single-turn Shoes dataset, created to facilitate multi-turn feedback-based image retrieval. It includes images of 10 categories of women’s shoes along with natural language descriptions.
dcterms:title: Multi-turn Shoes
